ygData.msgSnippet: I seriously doubt they d have high level encryption...it is after all just a game :). I would be interested in finding out exactly what they use, but I don t
ygData.messageBody:
I seriously doubt they'd have high level encryption...it is after all just a
game :).

I would be interested in finding out exactly what they use, but I don't have
the time nor do I have the knowledge to do that (I do programming, no
hacking, and not too much programming).

anyway...if anyone does find a way to hack please tell me, I started this
whole silly thread ;). <--silly who's gonna hack it when they could just be
playing instead :)

Thanks,
Omeg


>And i never seen games using anything more serious than
>such forms of protection.
